logger.message:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere"
var logPayload = payload default "" var status = "ok" var msg = "START getAttachments to GEOCALL"
--- CustomLogMapper::logger( { correlationId: correlationId, app: app, mule: mule, status: status, message: msg, (payload: logPayload) if (p('log.level') == "DEBUG"), env: p('mule.env') } )]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "nomeFileOriginale": payload.nomeFileOriginale, "dimensione": payload.dimensione, "descrizione": payload.descrizione, "formato": payload.formato, "nomeFileNormalizzato": payload.nomeFileNormalizzato, "contFile": vars.outputGetAttachmentsGeoCall.file, "tipoAllegato": payload.tipoAllegato }

logger.message:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere"
var logPayload = payload default "" var status = "ok" var msg = "end getAttachments from GEOCALL"
--- CustomLogMapper::logger( { correlationId: correlationId, app: app, mule: mule, status: status, message: msg, (payload: logPayload) if (p('log.level') == "DEBUG"), env: p('mule.env') } )]
